parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets current thumb position of <tt>CT_SLIDER</tt> or <tt>CT_XSLIDER</tt> with given idc of topmost user [[dialog]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''sliderSetPosition''' [idc, pos]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, pos]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''sliderSetPosition''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> pos: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[sliderSetPosition]] [101, 50];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[sliderPosition]], [[sliderRange]], [[sliderSetRange]], [[sliderSetSpeed]], [[sliderSpeed]], [[ctrlSetScrollValues]], [[progressSetPosition]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
